鷸蚌相爭，漁翁得利.en: lit. sandpiper and clam war together and the fisherman catches both (idiom); fig. neighbors who can't agree lose out to a third party

黃忠.en: Huang Zhong (-220), general of Shu in Romance of the Three Kingdoms, portrayed as an old fighter

黃腹冠鵯.en: (bird species of China) white-throated bulbul (Alophoixus flaveolus)

黎利.en: Le Loi, Vietnamese general and emperor who won back independence for Vietnam from China in 1428

黑格爾.en: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel (1770-1831), German philosopher

黑白林鵖.en: (bird species of China) Jerdon's bush chat (Saxicola jerdoni)

鼎峙.en: a tripartite balance, compromise between three rivals
